title: Bought wrong bundle, I want RNG, but bought dire wolves, Because its in my store main page.
body: Is there any chance I could change it?

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support. If you've already used up your refunds, it's entirely up to their discretion whether or not to grant your request, so bear that in mind.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
